changeSet.author: Jerry
changeSet.comment: Ingest BudgetConsructionBeginningBalanceDocument.xml workflow doc type into kuldba

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: the object code to be used for the trade in item accounts if the object code subtype of the account is one of the given set of Capital Asset subtypes

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: the object code to be used for the trade in item accounts if the object code subtype of the account is Capital Lease

changeSet.author: David
changeSet.sql: UPDATE "KULDBA"."AR_ORG_OPTION_T" SET PRCS_ORG_CD = 'VPIT', ORG_MSG_TXT = 'Use to test AZ tax', ORG_POSTAL_ZIP_CD = '86004' WHERE ROWID = 'AARjmMAATAAACwKAAA' UPDATE "KULDBA"."AR_ORG_OPTION_T" SET PRCS_ORG_CD = 'VPIT', ORG_POSTAL_ZIP_CD = '46266' WHERE ROWID = 'AARjmMAATAAACwKAAB' UPDATE "KULDBA"."AR_ORG_OPTION_T" SET AR_PRN_INV_IND = 'N' WHERE ROWID = 'AARjmMAATAAACwKAAC' UPDATE "KULDBA"."AR_ORG_OPTION_T" SET AR_PRN_INV_IND = 'N' WHERE ROWID = 'AARjmMAATAAACwKAAD' UPDATE "KULDBA"."AR_ORG_OPTION_T" SET PRCS_ORG_CD = 'VPIT', ORG_REMIT_CITY_NM = 'Bloomington', ORG_PHONE_NBR = '812-855-0000', ORG_POSTAL_ZIP_CD = '47405' WHERE ROWID = 'AARjmMAATAAACwKAAE' UPDATE "KULDBA"."AR_ORG_OPTION_T" SET ORG_MSG_TXT = 'Use to test CA tax', ORG_REMIT_ADDR_NM = 'First Bank of Pasco', ORG_REMIT_LN1_ADDR = 'PO Box 44567', ORG_REMIT_CITY_NM = 'Pasco', ORG_REMIT_ST_CD = 'WA', ORG_REMIT_ZIP_CD = '99301', ORG_PHONE_NBR = '949-294-6417', ORG_POSTAL_ZIP_CD = '95616' WHERE ROWID = 'AARjmMAATAAACwKAAF'
